Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: HalR1 is 63% identical and 71% similar to HalS8.
Sequence Information.Comments: Unlike HalH6, HalR1 does not appear to be archaeolytic, since it causes no change in the optical density or cell morphology of stationary phase Hbt. salinarum, nor can it form zones of inhibition on fully grown lawns. HalR1 has a dose-dependent, archaeostatic effect on growing Hbt. salinarum.

Literature.Title: Halocins and sulfolobicins the emerging story of archaeal protein and peptide antibiotics.
Literature.Author: O'Connor EM, Shand RF.
